cnd19:6.7: cūḷanikaṃ → culanikaṃ (bj) | lokadhātuṃ passeyya, mahāsahassimpi → tisahassampi mahāsahassiṃ (bj); tisahassiṃ mahāsahassampi (mr) | yāvatakaṃ vā → yāvatā (bj, mr)
cnd19:7.2: hāsapañño → idaṃ padaṃ bj potthake | adhigatapaṭisambhido → adhigatapaṭisambhidappatto (csp1ed)
cnd19:8.4: atthi jānitabbaṃ → atthi dhammaṃ jānitabbaṃ (bj, mr) | paramattho vā attho → paramattho vā (sya-all, csp1ed)
cnd19:9.5: sammāphusitānaṃ → sammā phassitānaṃ (bj); phusitānaṃ (sya-all) | aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino → … pariyantaṭṭhāniyo te (bj); aññamaññaṃ pariyantaṭṭhāyino (sya-all) | Yathā → yathā pana (bj)
cnd19:11.1: timitimiṅgalaṃ → timitipiṅgalaṃ (mr) | sabrahmako loko → sabrahmako (bj, sya-all) | sadevako → sadevako loko (mr)
cnd19:14.3: antonimuggaposīni → antonimuggapositāni (sya-all); antonimmuggaposīni (mr) | Seyyathāpi → taṃ kiṃ maññatha (bj, sya-all, mr)
cnd19:31.1: pañhena atthiko āgatomhi → pañhatthikamhā āgatā (bj, sya-all)
cnd19:42.2: ayaṃ pāṭho sī potthake natthi | aññesaṃ → paresaṃ (sya-all)
cnd19:44.3: ayaṃ pāṭho sī potthake natthi | assāraṃ → asāraṃ (bj)
cnd19:45.2: setakaccho → setavaccho (bj, cck, mr); setagaccho (sya1ed, sya2ed, csp1ed) | pālibhaddako → pāribhaddako (bj); pāḷibhaddako (mr) | pheṇapiṇḍo → pheṇupiṇḍo (sya-all) | udakapubbuḷaṃ → udakabububuḷakaṃ (bj); pubbulakaṃ (sya-all)
